mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USERID, EMAIL, PASSWD, USERNAME, NICKNAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, PHONE, REFUNDBANK, REFUNDACCOUNT) VALUES (USERID_SEQ.nextval, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, #{address1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundBank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWD = #{passwd}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, ADDRESS3 = #{address3}, PHONE = #{phone}, REFUNDBANK = #{refundBank}, REFUNDACCOUNT = #{refundAccount} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
